ValidationRule.description: The status of the Case needs to be Restoration Provided or Temporary Solution Provided status in order to activate Deferral.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( OR( ISCHANGED(CH_DeferralStatus__c), ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(CH_DeferralStatus__c),"") ), RecordType.DeveloperName = 'CH_NokiaIncidentWithRestoration', ISPICKVAL( CH_DeferralStatus__c , "Active"), NOT(ISPICKVAL( Status , "Restoration Provided")), NOT(ISPICKVAL( Status , "Temp Sol. Provided")) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Deferral Status can only be updated to Active when the case Status is "Restoration Provided" or "Temporary Solution Provided".
